entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
